round.description: Whether the avatar is round or not
round.description_zh: Whether the avatar is round or not

size.description: The size of the avatar, with optional values of mini small normal large
size.description_zh: The size of the avatar, with optional values of mini small normal large

alt.description: Image alt text, the same as the native attribute of the img tag
alt.description_zh: Image alt text, the same as the native attribute of the img tag

fit.description: Filling mode of avatar image, optional value fill contain cover none scale-down
fit.description_zh: Filling mode of avatar image, optional value fill contain cover none scale-down

loading.description: When lazy loading is enabled, the image displayed in the load
loading.description_zh: When lazy loading is enabled, the image displayed in the load

error.description: When lazy loading is enabled, the image displayed when loading fails
error.description_zh: When lazy loading is enabled, the image displayed when loading fails

events.name: load
events.description: Triggered when the avatar image is successfully loaded (failure in lazy loading mode will try to load the avatar image multiple times and will only be triggered when successfully loaded)
events.description_zh: Triggered when the avatar image is successfully loaded (failure in lazy loading mode will try to load the avatar image multiple times and will only be triggered when successfully loaded)

events.name: error
events.description: Triggered when the avatar image fails to load (failure in lazy loading mode will try to load the avatar image multiple times, will only be triggered at the end of the number of attempts)
events.description_zh: Triggered when the avatar image fails to load (failure in lazy loading mode will try to load the avatar image multiple times, will only be triggered at the end of the number of attempts)
